Hydras:

"Be careful to not show personality faults"hissed Hydras "As far a=
s the femme named Nightlight is in your grasp leave the base and we have to=
 do a little exchange, the clone tht would be the bait would be here and th=
e true one will go to our new base. With the clone we can ambush Rodimus he=
re and maybe we could have some fun"


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fr=
om: Richard Allen 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, November=
 22, 2007 10:42 AM
  Subject: Re: G2


  ::Jhiaxus/Hevng::

  Jhiaxus spoke=
 but it came from the puppet.

  Hevng: This a puppet of a former bodyguard=
 of Rodimus' wife. We will use it to lure her away and capture her. We will=
 then send in a clone of his wife who will be destroyed to demoralize Rodim=
us. You see centuries ago Hydras as the original Megatron had a similar pup=
pet of Optimus Prime made. He attempted to lure the Autobots into a bed of =
crystals that were destructive to Transformers. It almost worked but the re=
al Optimus Prime arrived. Tests were held by the Autobots to see who was th=
e real Optimus. Between the performance in the tests and personality faults=
 shown by the puppet the Autobots discovered the ruse.

  Super Cyclonus <s=
upercyclonus@...> wrote:


    --- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@yahoo.c=
om> wrote:

    > Perceptor/Hydras:
    > 
    > "This will help"said perce=
ptor while he handled a strange weapon and 
    > said "This will help you =
to knock out any bot and set it in stasis 
    > and this" he handle two mi=
ni metallic disk "Will block your 
    > signature, you and another robot c=
an leave the base practically 
    > invisible to scanners and advanced tra=
ck devices and"he said with a 
    > serious tone "remember that this puppe=
t has no spak so if this bot 
    > is set to a Cr... all will be discovere=
d"
    > 
    > 
    > Hydras said "You're good remmembering history, Jhiax=
us, can you told 
    > me how my great plan to destroy autobots with Optim=
us prime puppet 
    > was discovered?"

    Myrmidon stepped into the room=
 as well and surveyed the puppet. He
    tilted his head, "Interesting. How=
 is this suppose to fool Rodimus? I
    am no historian, Who or what is thi=
s?" 

    Preston
    (Myrmidon)
